string.value: #b#p2081001##k said I'll have to take the egg to the highest nest in the sky to wake up #b#t4001113##k... \n\n#o9300089# #r#a62411#
I battled #o9300089# after it hatched from the egg and I put him under my control.

Good news! I know how to hatch #t4001113#! It's not complicated. Do you know the sky nest? Great! Then it's simple--in the sky nest, you just put eggs in the highest nest and it should wake up. If you're not busy, would you like to hatch it?
Thank you. Look at #o9300089# carefully and be wary--it may attack you! Please tell me how it goes! I want to watch it with you, but I have to look after these rare dragon eggs. Bummer I can't go...
Are you busy? Darn! Where could I find someone to go to the sky nest...?
Wow! You hatched #o9300089#! Fantastic! Now it can fly by itself!

Huh? Did #o9300089# attack you? I told you to be careful! #o9300089# has its own identity and is very strong even if it's young. It doesn't know you, so that's why I think it attacked you. But you won so #o9300089# will follow you now. That's their rule. Good job! You've got yourself a Phoenix!
You can be a nice owner of #o9300089#. Please take care of it! It can help you in your travels!
When you kill #r#o9300089##k, which hatches in the sky nest, #o9300089# will follow you afterwards!
